content: I think I'll start by sharing a photo of the material on Instagram and Facebook, and ask my followers to guess what it is. I'll add a hint about the texture and color, and encourage people to share their guesses in the comments. I'll also create a branded hashtag and offer a daily prize for the person who correctly guesses the material. To make it more engaging, I'll share a leaderboard that tracks the most popular guesses and feature the winner on my social media page. Additionally, I'll offer a grand prize for the person who correctly guesses the material, such as a free product or a gift card. What do you think?
